notes: Implemented async lifecycle endpoints in policy HTTP routes: GET /api/policy/status and POST /api/policy/cancel using deterministic run-key resolution and existing dedupe semantics. Added queue helpers getPendingByDedupeKey/cancelByDedupeKey in PgJobQueue. Status returns ready/pending/not_found deterministically; cancel returns canceled or terminal errors when run already completed/not found. Added route tests for status/cancel and method enforcement.
